rationale: Transparent Data Encryption requires a license for Oracle Advanced Security to use.
recommended_action: Do not use "ENCRYPT" keyword when creating objects.  To remove at the table level decrypt a column with "ALTER TABLE table1 MODIFY (column1 DECRYPT)". At the tablespace level use "ALTER TABLESPACE" with the "ONLINE DECRYPT" clause.
error_message: Transparent Data Encryption is listed as a feature usage concern under Oracle Advanced Security
